long_description: Handsome and rugged, the Timbuk2 Telegraph Laptop Backpack features nostalgic styling paired with modern features to make it highly functional for daily use. Leather zipper pulls, chunky zippers, throwback color blocking, and a retro Timbuk2 woven label place this pack squarely in the '80s. Making it modern are a 15 in. MacBook Pro pocket, comfortable, adjustable shoulder straps, and a U-lock pocket. External pocket with bungee tightener can hold your water bottle instead of a U-lock if you're not into cycling. Side compression straps tighten and manage your load. Internal organizer pocket keeps small things in line. Daisy chain on the Timbuk2 Telegraph Laptop Backpack lets you clip on extras, like a hat or helmet. Closeout.
short_description: Handsome and rugged, the Timbuk2 Telegraph Laptop Backpack features nostalgic styling paired with modern features to make it highly functional for daily use.
